Articles.Content: After much trial and error i finally managed my first rendezvous, unfortunately after transferring the crew and going in for a landing all Kerbals were killed in action by a collision with a stray fuel pod.
You actually managed to get hit by space junk? You're lucky, I've always wanted to see that happen D:

That second image is really quite beautiful with the two lakes and the Mun in the background.

Anyway, congrats on your rendezvous
